snippet: Rodrigo Rato of Bankia, Spain’s largest real estate lender, is the most prominent Spanish banker to quit since the start of the European sovereign debt crisis.
abstract: Rodrigo Rato of Bankia, Spain’s largest real estate lender, resigns his post as executive chairman before an anticipated government recapitalization of the company; he is the most prominent Spanish banker to quit since the start of the European sovereign debt crisis.
lead_paragraph: Rodrigo Rato of Bankia, Spain’s largest real estate lender, is the most prominent Spanish banker to quit since the start of the European sovereign debt crisis.

headline.seo: Rodrigo Rato Resigns as Executive Chairman of Bankia
headline.main: Executive Chairman Resigns at Bankia, the Troubled Spanish Real Estate Lender
headline.print_headline: Executive Chairman Resigns at Bankia, the Troubled Spanish Real Estate Lender
